bug.author: madanadit
bug.summary: Config hash thread is leaked for long-running client w/o close
bug.description: Alluxio Version: 2.2.1 Describe the bug For long running Alluxio clients such as yarn RM, hive or presto daemons when the filesystem instance is not closed, we leak 1 config hash thread per context. To Reproduce Filesystem is cached on subject, submit multiple jobs (such as a spark count) to yarn w/ a different subject and jstack the RM. Expected behavior The config hash thread count should remain a constant over time irrespective of the number of jobs executed. Urgency Low Additional context N/A
